snippet: The hit Broadway musical “Mamma Mia!” will transfer from the Winter Garden Theater to the Broadhurst Theater six blocks south this year so the Shubert Organization — which owns both theaters — can clear the way for the possible opening of a...
abstract: The hit Broadway musical “Mamma Mia!” will transfer from the Winter Garden Theater to the Broadhurst Theater six blocks south this year so the Shubert Organization — which owns both theaters — can clear the way for the possible opening of a new musical, “Rocky.”
